page.title: 18Rector of Haworth
page.content: {Colin Spivey ,Rector of Haworth},came from{London}two years ago.The church is less of a social centre now but still brings to people a reason for living.Visitors to{Haworth}also come to the church and although some leave litter and upset people,he thinks it thrilling to have a chance to show the church as a living community giving allegiance to Jesus Christ.There has been a church in {Haworth }for{700 years.In {1750 William Grimshaw,}a famous preacher ,brought the {Wesleys, {John Newton}and others to{Haworth}and made it a centre of the {Evangelical {revival.Patrick Bronte}came here because of him.The {Brontes}are comparatively recent history.There are still people in the village whose parents could remember{Patrick}and{ {Arthur Bell Nicholls.}The{Brontes' writing has much of value to say to
